title: Neon-like sans serif
content:
I was wondering if this might be a font or if the neon effect was a customization of some existing Futura/Avant Garde-like font. Some details like the CO ligature make me think it might be the latter, but I'm not sure.

Any ideas?

Many thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831053848im_/http:/typophile.com/files/13443837863_a40aa93811_z%20(1)_6090.jpg)
author: Nicord
